ygData.subject: Re: Looking for tinkering items on karana
ygData.msgSnippet: That would be nice. I wouldn t have to carry around 4 poles. Now if I could just find a tinker on my server :( Because fishing well... sucks alot of people
ygData.messageBody:
That would be nice. I wouldn't have to carry around 4 poles. Now if I could
just find a tinker on my server :(
Because fishing well... sucks alot of people won't buy them. Maybe after
they fix it up a bit. Like if you fish out in the ocean with a high
skill you have a chance of geting better fish etc.

-Dave

-Dave
